mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP A SELECT #{billingCycleInfoVO.soId} AS SO_ID , SET_ITM_ID , EFT_BGN_YYMM , #{billingCycleInfoVO.billYymm} AS BILL_YYMM , BILL_CYCL , EFT_END_YYMM , CASE WHEN SET_ITM_ID = '00057' THEN CONCAT(#{billingCycleInfoVO.billYymm}, '25') ELSE SET_VAL END AS SET_VAL , REGR_ID AS REGR_ID , NOW() AS REG_DATE , NULL AS CHG_DATE , NULL AS CHGR_ID , BS_SET_VAL AS BS_SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP WHERE SO_ID = #{billingCycleInfoVO.soId} AND BILL_YYMM = #{billingCycleInfoVO.billYymm}

INSERT INTO TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP ( SO_ID, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, SET_ITM_ID, SET_VAL, EFT_BGN_YYMM, REGR_ID, REG_DATE, CHGR_ID, CHG_DATE, EFT_END_YYMM, BS_SET_VAL ) VALUES ( #{billingCycleInfoVO.soId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.billYymm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.billCycl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.setItmCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.setVal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.eftBgnYymm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, #{billingCycleInfoVO.eftEndYymm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingCycleInfoVO.setVal, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP /* 빌링주기설정정보 */ ( SO_ID, SET_ITM_ID, EFT_BGN_YYMM, BILL_YYMM, BILL_CYCL, EFT_END_YYMM, SET_VAL, REGR_ID, REG_DATE, CHGR_ID, CHG_DATE, BS_SET_VAL ) SELECT SO_ID , SET_ITM_ID , EFT_BGN_YYMM , #{billingCycleInfoVO.searchBillYymm} AS BILL_YYMM , BILL_CYCL , EFT_END_YYMM , CASE WHEN SET_ITM_ID = '00057' THEN CONCAT(#{billingCycleInfoVO.searchBillYymm}, SUBSTR(SET_VAL, 7, 2)) ELSE SET_VAL END AS SET_VAL , #{billingCycleInfoVO.regId} , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , BS_SET_VAL FROM TBLIV_BILL_CYCL_STP /* 빌링주기설정정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND BILL_YYMM = #{billingCycleInfoVO.lastYymm}
AND SO_ID = #{billingCycleInfoVO.soId}
